content.body: Hi everyone! I need some help. To continue working in the USA, I need to prove to the immigration department that my work on Test262 and ECMA-402 creates impact to the web as a whole. I've got some letters already but I'd love if anyone has time to help, I can also have the immigration lawyer to help drafting the letters. Please ping me.
It feels shameful to ask it this way but it's personally critical.
ain't nothing shameful about navigating the broken concept of citizenship, yo
sure thing, but far from citizenship, this is even still for temporary residency
+1 to TabAtkins, the system is what's shameful...
we need open borders, and that's that. in the meantime, you do what you gotta.
